TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ScriptControl : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ScriptControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public MustInherit Class ScriptControl Inherits WebControl Implements IScriptControl
public ref class ScriptControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl

summary.span: 为脚本控件提供一个抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for a script control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承自类并实现接口。 inherits from the class and implements the interface. 类是用于 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件的基本类。The class is a base class for ASP.NET Web server controls. 是一个抽象类，不能直接实例化。The is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly. 相反，派生类基于此抽象类。Instead, you derive a class based on this abstract class. 基类测试的页期间控制`PreRender`阶段派生的控件。The base class tests the page for a control during the `PreRender` stage of the derived control. 基类还可确保派生的控件调用的方法要注册过程的脚本控件`Render`事件。The base class also makes sure that the derived control calls methods of the control to register script during the `Render` event. 这包括注册对象时调用方法。This includes registering objects for the when the method is called. 方法可确保除非对象不会呈现本身呈现。The method makes sure that objects are not rendered unless the itself is rendered. 这使内关闭使用控件。This enables a to work inside a closed control. 可以添加任意数量的描述符和类型所需的任何类都派生自。You can add as many descriptors and types as necessary to any class that you derive from .

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回控件的脚本文件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the script files for the control.

returns.span: 一个 集合，其中包含已注册为嵌入资源的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件。

span.span: An collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.

summary.span: 引发 事件，并将脚本控件注册到 控件。

span.span: Raises the event and registers the script control with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后引发基类事件时，方法注册脚本控件控件。After the event of the base class is raised, the method registers the script control with the control.

span.span: The object that receives the server control content.

summary.span: 引发 事件并将服务器控件内容发送至提供的 对象，此对象编写要呈现到浏览器的内容。

span.span: Raises the event and sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered to the browser.
